text: these patterns were developed for internal gmv use and are made public in the hope that they will benefit others
also spreading these patterns throughout the spanish language tex community is expected to provide back benefits to gmv in that it can help keeping gmv in the mainstream of spanish users
however this is given for free and without any warranty

if you change this software you must include comments explaining who when and why
you are kindly requested to send any changes to tex@gmves
if you change the generating script you must include code in it such that any output is clearly labeled as generated by a modified script
despite the lack of warranty we would like to hear about any problem you find
